sourcesContent:
import { Modal, Stack, Thumbnail, TextContainer, Card, Button } from '@shopify/polaris' const ResolveConflict = ({ variant_with_conflict, variant_in_modal, can_solve, modal_open, closeModal })=>{ const { id, product_image: image_url, product_title: title, variant_price: price, variant_recommended_price: recommended_price, tax_calculated: calculated_duty = 0, calculated_duty_original = 0, priced_selected } = variant_in_modal const footer = ( paginador ) const handleSubmit = () => { } const handleClose = () => { closeModal() } const handleSelectPrice = () => { } return (
Nuestros expertos sugieren diferentes impuestos de los que usted ha indicado. Seleccione cual es el correcto
{title}
Regular price: ${price}
Impuestos: selecciona a continuación
Tu ingresaste
${price}

Impuesto ${calculated_duty_original}
Nosotros recomendamos
${recommended_price}

Impuesto ${calculated_duty}

 ) } export default ResolveConflict
